entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv and dqc_0080.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmpc3lvbuxp/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0071.7646] The filing has reported a value for the element us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax with a value of -4,643,000 using the ProductOrServiceAxis in the role 100680 - Disclosure - Amounts Reclassified out of AOCI (Detail) on the table us-gaap:ReclassificationOutOfAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax was the member us-gaap:ProductMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element TypeOfRevenueExtensibleList/TypeOfCostGoodOrServiceExtensibleList with a value of us-gaap:ProductMember and the member us-gaap:ProductMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax.
2. Tag the aggregate value of us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax with a value of -4,643,000 without the product of service axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax is reported.
The properties of this us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax fact are: Period :2017-07-01 to 2017-09-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis=us-gaap:AccumulatedGainLossCashFlowHedgeIncludingNoncontrollingInterestMember, us-gaap:DerivativeInstrumentRiskAxis=us-gaap:ForeignExchangeForwardMember, srt:ProductOrServiceAxis=us-gaap:ProductMember, us-gaap:ReclassificationOutOfAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeAxis=us-gaap:ReclassificationOutOfAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeMember Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:7646 Rule version: 8.0.0 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1048477/000156459018025196/bmrn-20180930.xml 27376
